all._comment: The 'longhands' array is populated in the code generator to avoid having to maintain it manually

backdrop-filter.__comment: FIXME: List `filter-value-list` as a valid-type once it's generically supported.

content.__comment: FIXME: This accepts a whole lot of other types and identifiers!

cx.__comment: This is an SVG 2 geometry property, see: https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/geometry.html#CX.

cy.__comment: This is an SVG 2 geometry property, see: https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/geometry.html#CY.

filter.__comment: FIXME: List `filter-value-list` as a valid-type once it's generically supported.

font.__comment: FIXME: Support font-size-adjust as a reset-only sub-property

math-depth.__comment: FIXME: `add(<integer>)` is also valid but we can't represent that here yet.

orphans.__comment: FIXME: We don't implement this property any further than compute time

outline-color.__comment: FIXME: We don't yet support `invert`. Until we do, the spec directs us to use `currentColor` as the default instead, and reject `invert`

position-area.__comment: Animation type is currently listed as TBD in the specification

r.__comment: This is an SVG 2 geometry property, see: https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/geometry.html#R.

rx.__comment: This is an SVG 2 geometry property, see: https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/geometry.html#RX.

ry.__comment: This is an SVG 2 geometry property, see: https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/geometry.html#RY.

scrollbar-gutter.__comment: This property should affect layout per-spec, but ladybird always uses overlay scrollbars so it doesn't in practice.

text-decoration-line.__comment: FIXME: This property is not supposed to be inherited, but we currently rely on inheritance to propagate decorations into line boxes.

text-transform.__comment: NOTE: This property has custom invalidation handling.

widows.__comment: FIXME: We don't implement this property any further than compute time

x.__comment: This is an SVG 2 geometry property, see: https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/geometry.html#X.

y.__comment: This is an SVG 2 geometry property, see: https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/geometry.html#Y.
